title: Quantum Assault
description: Quantum Assault, the second book in the Keeno Crime Thriller novels, finds Keeno McCole and his special crime-task-force, pursuing a human trafficking ring, only to discover a nightmarish scene where young girls being sold through the human-trafficking pipeline in Canada, are being injected with a virulent and deadly pathogen, one which takes on a life of its own. The chase takes them from Canada to Nigeria, China to Venezuela, as they track the elusive organization behind the plot, while the spreading pathogen threatens to kill millions of women across the globe if not stopped. "Been a fan now for some time of Mr Laplaines books, this one comes as no surprise regarding a complex plot, characters you would like to be yourself and bad guys that are just that...bad!" - Jonas O."Loved it. This book was very hard to put down. Full of action and suspense - awesome. Looking forward to the next one. enjoy all of this authors books - he is an awesome writer!!" - Elaine M.
